name: cypress-cucumber-allure-visual-testing
description: This project is a cypress front-end testing framework with visual testing and allure report being integrated.

scripts.allure:clear: if exist allure-results rmdir /q /s allure-results && if exist allure-report rmdir /q /s allure-report && npm run allure:visual:clear
scripts.allure:delete: del-cli --force allure-report/* && del-cli --force allure-results && del-cli --force cypress/screenshots && del-cli --force cypress/videos
scripts.allure:visual:clear: if exist cypress/screenshots rmdir /q /s cypress/screenshots && if exist cypress/videos rmdir /q /s cypress/videos
scripts.test: npm run cy:run || npm run posttest
scripts.test:chrome: npm run allure:delete && npm run cy:run:chrome || npm run posttest
scripts.test:firefox: npm run allure:delete && npm run cy:run:firefox || npm run posttest
scripts.test:webkit: npm run allure:delete && npm run cy:run:webkit || npm run posttest
scripts.clean:folders: rm -R -f allure-report && rm -R -f allure-results && rm -R -f cypress/screenshots && rm -R -f cypress/videos
scripts.tests: npm run cy:run || npm run aftertest
scripts.allure:history: mv -f allure-report/history allure-results/history && rm -r allure-report || true

author: cucumber
